post.description: Create a new client for the authenticated user.

get.description: Get a paginated list of clients for the authenticated user.
Get a specific client by ID.

post.description: Create a new project for a client.

get.description: Get a paginated list of projects for the authenticated user.
Get a specific project by ID.

post.description: Create a new time entry for a project.

enum: End time must be after start time
endedAt must be greater than startedAt

get.description: Get a paginated list of time entries for the authenticated user.
Get a specific time entry by ID.

patch.description: Update a time entry (only if not locked in an invoice).

enum: Time entry is locked and cannot be modified
This time entry is part of a non-draft invoice and cannot be modified
End time must be after start time
endedAt must be greater than startedAt

delete.description: Delete a time entry (only if not locked in an invoice).

enum: Time entry is locked and cannot be deleted
This time entry is part of a non-draft invoice and cannot be deleted

get.description: Get summary report of hours and amounts by client or project for a date range.

enum: End date must be after start date

get.description: Get detailed time entries for a specific date range with totals.

post.description: Create a draft invoice from time entries for a client within a date range.

enum: End date must be after start date
dateTo must be greater than dateFrom
No unlocked time entries found for the specified client and date range
No billable time entries available for invoicing

get.description: Get a paginated list of invoices for the authenticated user.
Get a specific invoice by ID.

delete.description: Delete a draft invoice and unlock associated time entries.

enum: Only draft invoices can be deleted
Invoice must be in DRAFT status to be deleted

patch.description: Update invoice status (forward transitions only: draft → sent → paid).

enum: Status can only transition forward: DRAFT → SENT → PAID

post.description: Generate and get download link for invoice PDF.
